channel.title: cookiecrook: James Craig
channel.description: Cookiecrook is James Craig, a graphic design, web, video, music, and technology junkie living in Austin, Texas. The site contains personal and professional information regarding his life and interests.

item.title: This year I will...
item.description: A call to action... for myself.

item.title: SXSW 2005 Panel Transcription… plus.
item.description: Finally, we finished the transcription (plus) for our SXSW 2005 panel, Accessibility, why can’t we all just get along? Whew… Glenda is a rock star for transcribing all that.
